thread.title: Hasbro Agrees to Acquire Power Rangers for About $500 Million

author: Paul Ziobro
title: Hasbro Agrees to Acquire Power Rangers for About $500 Million

organizations.name: hasbro agrees to acquire power rangers

text:
Hasbro Inc. is buying Power Rangers and other entertainment brands in a cash-and-stock deal valued at roughly $500 million, adding the popular television-based toy brand to its portfolio.
Power Rangers was created in 1993 as a childrenâ€™s television show. The TV series, currently in its 25th season, has been translated into several languages and airs in dozens of markets around the globe. Last year, it spawned a film, and Hasbro earlier this year acquired the rights to make Power Ranger action figures and other toys starting... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
